s.text: IF YOU DO NOT COMPLY, THEN IT WILL NOT BE MY FAULT IF YOU DO NOT RECEIVE YOUR PACKAGE Once you send the money, try to notify us with the MTCN for confirmation and for immediate action on the release of your consignment.

I SHALL BE COMING TO YOUR COUNTRY FOR AN OFFICIAL MEETING BY NEXT WEEK AND I WILL BE COMING ALONG WITH YOUR FUNDS OF ($12 Million Dollars) WITH ME BUT THIS TIME I WILL NOT GO THROUGH CUSTOMS BECAUSE AS AN AMBASSADOR TO NIGERIA, I AM A US GOVERNMENT AGENT AND I HAVE THE VETO POWER TO GO THROUGH CUSTOMS.

I MUST SAY THAT YOU ARE A VERY LUCKY PERSON BECAUSE OUR DIPLOMATIC OFFICER WILL BE COMING WITH ME TO DELIVER THESE FUNDS TO YOU AS AN ATM CARD OR AS A CONSIGNMENT WITH ME TO YOUR DOORSTEP DEPENDING ON WHICH METHOD OF PAYMENT YOU PREFER AND THERE IS NOTHING ANYONE IN THIS WORLD CAN DO ABOUT IT.

SEND THE FEE VIA WESTERN UNION MONEY TRANSFER RECEIVER'S NAME: ELIAS UDEALOR ADDRESS: LAGOS,NIGERIA TEXT QUESTION: GOOD ANSWER: UN AMOUNT: $154 Dollars only AS SOON AS YOU SEND THE FEE MAKE SURE YOU SEND ME THE PAYMENT INFORMATION.
Date: Sun, 7 Nov 2010 07:01:39 -0800 (PST) From: "U.S.A AMBASSADOR" <officemeoo1256@att.net> Reply-To: ambassador_a@ymail.com Subject: CORNING TO US AMBASSADOR To: undisclosed recipients: ;
